Deck - Class in <Unnamed>
This class manages a deck of cards, including initializing the deck with all standard cards, shuffling the deck, and dealing cards from it.

Constructs a new deck of cards, initializes it, and shuffles it.

F

findWinner(int, int) - Static method in class BlackjackGameSimulator
This method determines the winner of the Blackjack game based on the final totals of the dealer and the player.

Hand - Class in <Unnamed>

P

PlayerHand - Class in <Unnamed>
This class extends the `Hand` class to provide functionality specific to the player's hand.

Constructs a new player's hand by calling the base Hand class constructor.
playerTurn(Deck, PlayerHand) - Static method in class BlackjackGameSimulator
This method allows the player to choose whether to hit (draw a card) or hold (stop drawing cards).
playGame() - Static method in class BlackjackGameSimulator
This method contains the logic for playing the game, including dealing cards, managing the player's and dealer's hands, and determining the winner.

S
